subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] EVP maker
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi Margaret,

yes, you done it right - congrats! :) I can hear it almost like you;
only the last two parts sound different to me. Instead of "How can I do
you for?", I hear "How am I to you? (or)". The last part is
unintelligible for my (non-english) ears. The best part is definitely
the phrase "I'm at the talk therapy group." Obviously the `guysï¿½ do have
a sense of humor...

Stefan

-- 

> Thanks so much for the SJ Allophones files, Stefan!
> I got an amazing response - well, amazing to me, anyway ;0) - right off the bat.  
> Just posted my first file ever to the forum. Hope I've done it correctly.  Margaret

> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>>
